resource_data:
<expression xsi:schemaLocation="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0 http://fire.eun.org/lode/imslorsltitm_v1p0.xsd" xmlns="http://www.imsglobal.org/xsd/imslorsltitm_v1p0" xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance">
  <identifier>
    <catalog>hdl</catalog>
    <entry>10494/75161</entry>
  </identifier>
  <identifier>
    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>
    <entry>75161</entry>
  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>40b2660e-f7ec-4070-2f17-f5529fe0559a#1#3</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">Benedetto Antelami: Krisztus levétete a keresztről, 1178, a Pármai székesegyház lebontott szószéke, részlet, dombormű.</string>
            <string language="en">Benedetto Antelami: Descent from the Cross, 1178, demolished pulpit of the Cathedral of Parma, fragment, relief.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Benedetto Antelami: Abfall vom Kreuz, 1178, 
demolierte Kanzel der Kathedrale von Parma, Fragment, 
Entlastung.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Benedetto Antelami : Descente de la croix, 
1178, pupitre démoli de la cathédrale de Parme, fragment, 
soulagement.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Benedetto Antelami: Descida da cruz, 1178, 
pulpit demolished da catedral de Parma, fragmento, relevo.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Benedetto Antelami: Discesa dalla traversa,
1178, quadro di comando demolito della cattedrale di Parma, frammento,
rilievo.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Benedetto Antelami: Κάθοδος από το σταυρό,
1178, κατεδαφισμένο pulpit του καθεδρικού ναού της Πάρμας, 
τεμάχιο, ανακούφιση.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Benedetto Antelami: Pendiente de la cruz, 
1178, púlpito demolido de la catedral de Parma, fragmento, 
relevación.</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">Az Antelami által készített domborműve a középkor egyik legfontosabb keresztrefeszítés ábrázolása.</string>
            <string language="en">Antelami’s relief is the one of the most important crucifying representing work of art from the middle age</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">Krisztus,  keresztrefeszítés,  dombormű,  Benedetto Antelami,  Antelami,  Párma,  </string>
            <string language="en">Christ, crucifying, relief, Benedetto Antelami, Antelami, Parma</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Antelami?s Entlastung ist die des wichtigsten crucifying 
darstellenden Kunstwerks vom mittleren Alter</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le soulagement d'Antelami?s est celui de l'oeuvre d'art de
représentation crucifiante la plus importante de l'âge moyen</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">O relevo de Antelami?s é esse do trabalho de arte de 
representação crucifying o mais importante da idade média</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Il rilievo di Antelami?s è quello dell'opera d'arte 
rappresentante crucifying più importante dall'età centrale</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Η ανακούφιση Antelami?s είναι ένα από το 
σημαντικότερο crucifying αντιπροσωπεύοντας έργο της τέχνης από
τη μέση ηλικία</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La relevación de Antelami?s es la que esta' de la obra de
arte que crucifica de representación más importante de la edad 
media</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Christ, crucifying, Entlastung, Benedetto Antelami, 
Antelami, Parma</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Le Christ, crucifiant, soulagement, Benedetto Antelami,
Antelami, Parme</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Christ, crucifying, relevo, Benedetto Antelami, Antelami,
Parma</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Christ, crucifying, rilievo, Benedetto Antelami, 
Antelami, Parma</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Χριστός, ανακούφιση, Benedetto Antelami, Antelami, 
Πάρμα</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Cristo, crucificando, relevación, Benedetto Antelami, 
Antelami, Parma</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
        <educational>
          <learningResourceType>
            <source>LRE.learningResourceTypeValues</source>
            <value>image</value>
          </learningResourceType>
        </educational>
        <rights>
          <cost>
            <source>costValues</source>
            <value>no</value>
          </cost>
          <copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
            <source>copyrightAndOtherRestrictionsValues</source>
            <value>yes</value>
          </copyrightAndOtherRestrictions>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A tartalom kizárólag kizárólag az oktatás illetve tudományos kutatás céljára használható szigorúan non-profit jelleggel.</string>
            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
        </rights>
        <lifeCycle>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>roleValues</source>
              <value>publisher</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard 
version:3.0
n:;
fn: 
org:Nemzeti Tankönyvkiadó Rt.
end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </lifeCycle>
        <classification>
          <purpose>
            <source>purposeValues</source>
            <value>discipline</value>
          </purpose>
          <taxonPath>
            <source>
              <string language="x-none">LRE-0001</string>
            </source>
            <taxon>
              <id>591</id>
            </taxon>
          </taxonPath>
        </classification>
        <metaMetadata>
          <contribute>
            <role>
              <source>LRE.roleMetaValues</source>
              <value>provider</value>
            </role>
            <entity>begin:vcard
        org:Sulinet
        version:3.0
        end:vcard</entity>
          </contribute>
        </metaMetadata>
      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
